settings.accordion_text: Use this accordion to add info such as Materials, Sizing, Features, Shipping and Returns policies

We proudly present our second Iron Heart x Dehen 1920 collaboration. We introduce the Dehen Custom Moto Jersey "Iron Heart Hamburg". 100 % worsed black wool with big gold/ yellow embroidery and black/ dark blue striped left arm. Super cool, super exclusive and of course only available at Iron Heart Germany. Limited number of pieces!

  • 100% worsted wool, knit by us on 1940's knitting machines
  • Vintage style turtle zip collar
  • Vintage style Talon zipper and pull
  • Medium weight three-end jersey knit
  • Open cuffs and open shirt tail hem for easy layering
  • Double needle stitched internal elbow patches
  • Racing stripes at sleeves on left arm in black/ dark navy
  • Dehen Logo patch
  • Giuli is wearing a size Large, is 178 cm tall and weighs 85 kg
  • Made in Portland, Oregon USA

Our model is 6'4" and wears XL

See our size guide here

The hoodie is made of 100% organic cotton.

See our washing & care instructions here.

We ship world-wide.

See our shipping costs here.

settings.title: How long does it take to get my products?
settings.text:
Domestic shipping can take up to 5 business days.

Foreign shipping could take up to 14 business days.

Due to global supply chain challenges, shipping times could be longer than usual.

settings.title: Do you offer warranty for your products?
settings.text:
All our products are subject to quality control.

Our warranty provides a guarantee against manufacturer defects.

The guarantee covers any manufacturing, design, or material defect. Please notify us within 2 months of noticing any defects.

It does not cover blows, improper use, or other issues that are not attributable to a manufacturer defects.

settings.title: Do you offer refunds?
settings.text:
Yes, we offer full and partial refunds.

Please enquire for more information about our Refund policy.

settings.title: What shipping methods do you offer?
settings.text: We use all major carriers, and local courier partners. Use the shipping estimator in the cart to check your shipping rates.
